## 📊 グラフHTML（Chart.js部分）

```html
<!-- グラフコンテナ -->
<div class="chart-container">
    <canvas id="recoveryYearsChart"></canvas>
</div>

<!-- Chart.jsスクリプト -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const ctx = document.getElementById('recoveryYearsChart').getContext('2d');
        
        const chart = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: {
                labels: ['年2往復', '年4往復', '年6往復', '年8往復', '年10往復'],
                datasets: [
                    {
                        label: 'パターンA（500,000円）',
                        data: [10.1, 5.6, 3.8, 2.9, 2.4],
                        borderColor: '#0066cc',
                        backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 102, 204, 0.1)',
                        borderWidth: 3,
                        pointBackgroundColor: '#0066cc',
                        pointRadius: 6,
                        fill: true,
                        tension: 0.2
                    },
                    {
                        label: 'パターンB（200,000円）',
                        data: [4.0, 2.2, 1.5, 1.2, 0.9],
                        borderColor: '#5ac8fa',
                        backgroundColor: 'rgba(90, 200, 250, 0.1)',
                        borderWidth: 3,
                        pointBackgroundColor: '#5ac8fa',
                        pointRadius: 6,
                        fill: true,
                        tension: 0.2
                    }
                ]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                plugins: {
                    legend: {
                        position: 'top',
                        labels: {
                            font: {
                                family: "'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif",
                                size: 14
                            },
                            padding: 20
                        }
                    },
                    tooltip: {
                        callbacks: {
                            label: function(context) {
                                return context.dataset.label + ': ' + context.raw + '年';
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },
                scales: {
                    y: {
                        beginAtZero: true,
                        reverse: false,
                        title: {
                            display: true,
                            text: '回収年数',
                            font: {
                                family: "'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif",
                                size: 14
                            }
                        },
                        ticks: {
                            font: {
                                family: "'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif"
                            },
                            callback: function(value) {
                                return value + '年';
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    x: {
                        ticks: {
                            font: {
                                family: "'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif"
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        });
    });
</script>
```

## 📝 必要なCSS（グラフコンテナ用）

```css
.chart-container {
    height: 300px;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 20px 0;
}
```

## 📚 必要な外部ライブラリ

HTMLの`<head>`内に以下を追加してください：

```html
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
```

Tool use: **apply_patch**

<details>
        <summary>Apply patch for /Users/mba2024/Documents/Obsidian/Dai DB/00_Projects/SFC_JGC修行完全ガイド/ANA SFC修行_損益分岐点分析_完全版.html</summary>
      

```diff
<<'PATCH'
*** Begin Patch
@@
         <div class="page-title">回収シミュレーション｜年2回・4回・6回・8回・10回往復</div>
         <div class="accent-line"></div>
+        
+        <!-- グラフ：回収年数の推移（年2〜10往復） -->
+        <div class="chart-container">
+            <canvas id="recoveryYearsChart"></canvas>
+        </div>
+        <script>
+            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+                const canvas = document.getElementById('recoveryYearsChart');
+                if (!canvas || !window.Chart) return;
+                const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
+                new Chart(ctx, {
+                    type: 'line',
+                    data: {
+                        labels: ['年2往復', '年4往復', '年6往復', '年8往復', '年10往復'],
+                        datasets: [
+                            {
+                                label: 'パターンA（500,000円）',
+                                data: [10.1, 5.6, 3.8, 2.9, 2.4],
+                                borderColor: '#0066cc',
+                                backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 102, 204, 0.1)',
+                                borderWidth: 3,
+                                pointBackgroundColor: '#0066cc',
+                                pointRadius: 6,
+                                fill: true,
+                                tension: 0.2
+                            },
+                            {
+                                label: 'パターンB（200,000円）',
+                                data: [4.0, 2.2, 1.5, 1.2, 0.9],
+                                borderColor: '#5ac8fa',
+                                backgroundColor: 'rgba(90, 200, 250, 0.1)',
+                                borderWidth: 3,
+                                pointBackgroundColor: '#5ac8fa',
+                                pointRadius: 6,
+                                fill: true,
+                                tension: 0.2
+                            }
+                        ]
+                    },
+                    options: {
+                        responsive: true,
+                        maintainAspectRatio: false,
+                        plugins: {
+                            legend: {
+                                position: 'top',
+                                labels: {
+                                    font: { family: "'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif", size: 14 },
+                                    padding: 20
+                                }
+                            },
+                            tooltip: {
+                                callbacks: {
+                                    label: function(context) {
+                                        return context.dataset.label + ': ' + context.raw + '年';
+                                    }
+                                }
+                            }
+                        },
+                        scales: {
+                            y: {
+                                beginAtZero: true,
+                                reverse: false,
+                                title: {
+                                    display: true,
+                                    text: '回収年数',
+                                    font: { family: "'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif", size: 14 }
+                                },
+                                ticks: {
+                                    font: { family: "'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif" },
+                                    callback: function(value) { return value + '年'; }
+                                }
+                            },
+                            x: {
+                                ticks: { font: { family: "'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif" } }
+                            }
+                        }
+                    }
+                });
+            });
+        </script>
         
         <table>
*** End Patch
PATCH
```
